text: Pork pies are a type of meat pie and are a common British food. They are made of chopped pork and pork jelly sealed in a hot water crust pastry, and are most of the time eaten cold. They are most of the time eaten at picnics, or in a lunch. ==Other websites== * The Pork Pie Appreciation Society * Photos showing the steps in constructing a rather large pork pie * Pork pie, in What Am I Eating? A Food Dictionary Category:Savoury pies
title: Pork pie
